comment: Kasparov, on commenting this game for the press, did not say much about the opening. "Neither of us is an expert in this variation, I did nothing special and just made ordinary, sound moves." But at this point in the game Kasparov had had a vision that would have ocurred to few others: to bring over his queen from h6 to b6, into the attack.
